name: High Performance Holdings, Inc.
description: High Performance Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of advanced performance-enhancing products and solutions for the sports and fitness industry. Founded in 2010, HPH focuses on developing innovative technologies that help athletes optimize their performance and achieve their goals. The company offers a range of products including specialized training equipment, nutritional supplements, and performance monitoring devices. HPH is committed to research and development, collaborating with top athletes and trainers to ensure that their products meet the highest standards of quality and effectiveness. With a strong emphasis on sustainability, High Performance Holdings also strives to minimize its environmental impact through responsible sourcing and eco-friendly practices. The company aims to empower individuals to reach their full potential while promoting a healthier lifestyle through active participation in sports and fitness. HPH's mission is to lead the way in performance innovation and inspire athletes at all levels to push their limits and break barriers.

seo.meta_title: High Performance Holdings, Inc. | Performance Enhancing Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore High Performance Holdings, Inc., a leader in sports performance products and solutions. Discover innovative training equipment, nutritional supplements, and cutting-edge technology to enhance athletic performance.

faq.question: What does High Performance Holdings specialize in?
faq.answer: High Performance Holdings specializes in performance-enhancing products for sports and fitness.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of High Performance Holdings?
faq.answer: Jessica Thompson is the CEO of High Performance Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is High Performance Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: High Performance Holdings is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.

faq.question: What are some of the main products offered by HPH?
faq.answer: HPH offers training equipment, nutritional supplements, and performance monitoring devices.

faq.question: When was High Performance Holdings founded?
faq.answer: High Performance Holdings was founded in 2010.
